title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
description: When trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset for the table report item, the group dialog is not displayed.
OB: The group dialog is not displayed when attempting to create a new table group without setting the dataset for the table report item.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed even if the dataset for the table report item is not set.
SR:
1. Add a table report item to the report.
2. Do not set the dataset for the table report item.
3. Try to create a new table group and observe if the group dialog is shown.
